ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Dark Lavacons saw the preds ahead, and prepared for attack. Ok, troops, ATTACK!!!  SHOW THE PREDACONS NO MERCY! Astral commanded. Fenox began firing

::Dark Lavacons/Dollen::

      The Dark Lavacons saw the preds ahead, and =
prepared for attack.

      "Ok, troops, ATTACK!!!  SHOW THE PREDACONS NO M=
ERCY!" Astral commanded.

      Fenox began firing dark heat optic blasts a=
t DrillBit.

      Recklessa landed, and fired her gatling guns madly at Go=
ldenEye.

     "You show 'em your stuff Recklessa!!" yelled Starlight, who =
fired a shot from her darkflame crossbow at GoldenEye.

     Griplash staye=
d in the air, looking for the perfect target to slice open with his dark la=
va blade.

      Astral, still in the air, grabbed his darkflame rocket lau=
ncher, and fired one big blast down at KitKat.

      "Let's show them the =
power of the Allience!" Astral yelled with pride.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
 (Ok, I forget where I last was with Dollen, so just go a=
long with me, ok?)

      Dollen saw bad things happening.  People were die=
ing.  Cybertronians.  He was on Cybertron.  Something was destroying everyt=
hing.  He ran across the Cybertronian street, looking for somewhere to hide=
, when he froze.  

     A fem-bot was there in front of him.  This was the=
 fem-bot he always had visions of!  

     "Who are you??" cried Dollen, fe=
eling fear.

     "Your destiny," the bot said.

     "My what?" Dollen sai=
d, confused.

     Suddenly, she exploded, and then, everything started to =
explode.  He felt pain, then he exploded!  His spark was floating in nothin=
g, and then it dissolved.

     "AAAHHH!!!!!" Dollen screamed, suddenly awa=
kening from a bad dream.

     He calmed down, then looked around.

     "S=
ilent.....Where is everybody?" He said to himself.  

      Dollen realized=
 they must be in battle.

     Suddenly, Dollen had a vision.  It showed Ki=
tKat and the others fighting the Alliance, and getting the crap beat out of=
 them.

     "No!  Not if I can help it!" Dollen yelled, and ran out of the=
 base.

      Dollen ran, and ran, until he arrived at the scene of the bat=
tle.

      He jumped out in the center of the battlefield.

      "The Pre=
dacons will win!!!!!!!!!!!!" Dollen screamed.

      He grabbed his ray gun=
, and fired madly around, all over the Alliance force, inaccurately, but lo=
ads o' shots.
